attributes.action: Ban cyclists from using 'FLASHING' lights at night
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How distracting are cyclists using 'FLASHING' red lights at night and in poor weather conditions. Motorists would be prosecuted for using such lights so why dont the police prosecute cyclists for doing this and if they have a vailid driving licence put points on it. Better still BAN flashing light on bicycles.
